A dove flying in a circle surrounded by flowers and leaves, representing harmony and unity among all living beings.
A hand holding an olive branch, symbolizing the end of conflict and the start of peaceful negotiations.
A heart made out of interconnected puzzle pieces, representing how different cultures and perspectives can come together to create a cohesive whole.
A rainbow-colored globe, symbolizing the diversity of our world and the importance of understanding and respecting each other's differences.
A tree growing from a seed, representing the potential for growth and renewal after conflict or division has been overcome.
